title: idea
subTitle: Research & Design
desc: Everything start with an idea, a vision. By going through research and designs, I will make sure you have a website that is user friendly and exceeds expectations.

title: development
subTitle: Building the product
desc: After going through designing, development can begin, making the front-end, a back-end, and bringing those visions, ideas, and designs to reality.

title: enjoy
subTitle: Deployment
desc: After the website is build, its time to deploy, quickly work out possible kinks or bugs that passed previous testing, and see all the hard work pay off by seeing the product up and running.
